message:
If you are in the D.C. area on Thursday night be sure to stop by the Belgrade NoMa Lounge to celebrate Amara Legal Center’s 5th anniversary. They are dedicated to providing free legal services to individuals who have been victimized through commercial sex. 
You can find out more by clicking the link in their bio. 
#Repost @amaralegal
・・・
You're invited! Join us on April 4 from 6-8PM for the Amara Legal Center's Fifth Anniversary celebration! RSVP link in bio. #dc #washingtondc #law #nonprofit
